info.name: Mura Food Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Mura Food ecommerce backend with four user types: Customer, Vendor/Prepper, Rider/Driver, and Admin

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Grilled Chicken",
    "description": "Healthy grilled chicken with vegetables",
    "price": 15.99,
    "category": "main-course",
    "dietaryInfo": ["gluten-free", "high-protein"],
    "ingredients": ["chicken", "broccoli", "carrots"],
    "nutritionInfo": {
        "calories": 350,
        "protein": 30,
        "carbs": 10,
        "fat": 15
    },
    "prepTime": 30,
    "isAvailable": true
}
